extendedInfo.description: The Channel NewsAsia Android app provides news as it happens, with in-depth analysis and expert opinion on the day's events. The app is fully optimised for both smartphones and tablets, and is compatible with devices running Android 2.3 upwards.You can browse the news by category, such as Latest, Singapore, Business, Sport and many more, as well swipe through full-screen Photo galleries and watch the latest Video clips. Share your thoughts via our Polls or on your social media, and review the TV listings and local weather wherever you are. The home screen can be personalised with your preferred news categories, and content can be downloaded for offline reading later.We are working on an update to optimise the app for the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (7"), which will be available soon. If your device is not currently fully supported, please email us at newseditor@channelnewsasia.com  and we will consider including it in a future update.

reviews.title: Fix the lag and random updates
reviews.comment: Thank god for disabling the GPS, but why does the app need permission to make calls? Very malicious app. Lags as hell on any Android device I use. Annoying that it is so slow to scroll, and randomly updates articles then jumps back when scrolling through articles.
reviews.author: Aaron Cheng

reviews.title: Terrible UI
reviews.comment: List of news automatically scrolls upwards by itself. Lag in scrolling. When scrolling down to read news, I will be brought to next article. Latest news doesn\'t load at first try. Enough said, sometimes an update is better than none.
reviews.author: Yee Leen Ng

reviews.title: Ugly
reviews.comment: Terrible looking UI
reviews.author: Samuel Tan

reviews.title: GPS actually turns off but only after a while
reviews.comment: Amazingly they actually decided to turn off the gps after the app is launched. However there\'s no justification of why it\'s on in the first place.
reviews.author: Peter Tan

reviews.title: Poorly implemented
reviews.comment: News will automatically scroll up disrupting the flow. Latest news just won\'t load on first connection and subsequent refreshes. Lousy than the previous CNA app. Fail.
reviews.author: Toh Yong Quan

reviews.title: Page jumps up while scrolling
reviews.comment: The page jumps up by itself while scrolling down.
reviews.author: Sandra Khoo

reviews.title: Not smooth
reviews.comment: Too over-sensitive to touch. Skips to the next news item when you only intend to scroll down. After a while it gets irritating. News content Ok though..
reviews.author: raz nor

reviews.title: Where is the live news coverage?
reviews.comment: Cannot find live TV Format news coverage -
reviews.author: Steve Chappel

reviews.title: No auto rotation
reviews.comment: Why isnt this apps developed to hv rotating capability? Not user friendly to note samsung 8.0
reviews.author: wendy seow

reviews.title: Battery hog
reviews.comment: Runs down battery in the background.
reviews.author: Isurus Oxyrinchus

reviews.title: One of the very slow updating news apps
reviews.comment: No auto updating, struggling to update, don\'t know using gps for what \302\277
reviews.author: dhanaraju dhevasakayam

reviews.comment: nice
reviews.author: Kan Boon Wah

reviews.comment: Lousy
reviews.author: Eric Tanweelai

reviews.title: Good ap
reviews.comment: Must download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not updating
reviews.comment: Not updating
reviews.author: Rommel Lara

reviews.title: Slick and current
reviews.comment: Fast and current! Glad to see Channel NewsAsia on Android. Slick interface. Love the videos and real time news updates, as well as save to favourites feature.
reviews.author: Ridz Al

reviews.title: Much better now
reviews.comment: I\'d give  5 stars if it had live TV feed
reviews.author: Daniel Davis

reviews.title: Welcome to Android!
reviews.comment: Glad to see Channel NewsAsia on Android. Fast app, love the new features and photo albums each day.
reviews.author: John Tan

reviews.title: Please improve
reviews.comment: Annoying that it keeps refreshing the list of news articles every few seconds and jumping about when i am scrolling thru the list of news articles. The Read and Unread marks are also random and changes at will.
reviews.author: insalien cyang

reviews.title: Still having the no connection problem
reviews.comment: And besides that, don\'t get the latest updated news and keep on. On the 1st row of news when I tried to moved down to read others news.
reviews.author: Desmond Yip
